amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute requires the Congress to provide for a balanced Federal budget by the year 2002; requires a three-fifths vote to run a budget deficit; requires a three-fifths vote to increase the public debt limit; and requires a three-fifths vote to increase taxes. This amendment was superceded with passage of the Schaefer substitute amendment (A006). See Roll Call No. 49.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the report of the House Committee on Rules (H. Rept. 104-3) and made in order by the provisions of H. Res. 44.
